str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have come, be present, have arrived. A primary verb; to arrive, i.e. Be present.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To expect, wait for, await, think, anticipate. From pros and dokeuo; to anticipate; by implication, to await.
And, even, also, namely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Apparently a primary word; an 'hour'.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
And, even, also, namely.

word: He will cut him to pieces
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a compound of a derivative of dis and a derivative of temno; to bisect, i.e. to flog severely.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(passively) untrustworthy (person), or incredible (thing).
